datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to bio-domes, sustainable habitats, and man-made ecological systems.

columns.name: occupancy_status
columns.description: Whether the ecosystem is at full occupancy capacity or not, impacting energy usage and internal climate control

columns.name: average_daylight_hours
columns.description: Average number of daylight hours the ecosystem experiences.

columns.name: automated_ventilation_active
columns.description: Indicates whether an automated ventilation system is active to manage internal temperatures.

columns.name: season
columns.description: Current season in which the ecosystem data was recorded

columns.name: solar_panel_coverage_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of the bio-dome surface covered by solar panels

columns.name: type_of_ecosystem
columns.description: The type of sustainable habitat

columns.name: internal_CO2_level_ppm
columns.description: Concentration of CO2 inside the bio-dome measured in parts per million

columns.name: photosynthetic_activity_rating
columns.description: A numeric rating of the overall photosynthetic activity of plants within the ecosystem

columns.name: biodiversity_index
columns.description: A numerical index representing the diversity of species within the ecosystem

columns.name: water_recycling_system_present
columns.description: Indicates if a water recycling system is implemented, impacting internal humidity and temperature control.

columns.name: reflective_glass_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of the dome surface made up of reflective glass.

columns.name: carbon_dioxide_levels
columns.description: Measured levels of carbon dioxide in parts per million

columns.name: competitive_visitor_services
columns.description: A binary indicator of whether the ecosystem provides more visitor services compared to nearby attractions

columns.name: number_of_species
columns.description: Number of different species maintained within the ecosystem

columns.name: educational_facilities
columns.description: Indicates if the ecosystem includes facilities for educational purposes

columns.name: ecosystem_size_hectares
columns.description: Total area of the ecosystem measured in hectares

columns.name: open_year_round
columns.description: Indicates whether the ecosystem operates throughout the entire year

columns.name: average_sunlight_duration
columns.description: The average duration of sunlight per day in hours over a year inside the bio-dome.

columns.name: foot_traffic
columns.description: Number of visitors per month who enter the ecosystem

columns.name: external_temperature_C
columns.description: The temperature outside the bio-dome measured in Celsius

columns.name: maintenance_cost_per_sq_m
columns.description: Average maintenance cost per square meter

columns.name: real_time_shadow_tracking
columns.description: Indicates if a real-time shadow tracking system is active to optimize sunlight exposure.

columns.name: plant_density
columns.description: Number of plants per square meter in the artificial ecosystem

columns.name: visitor_entries_per_month
columns.description: Average number of visitors entering the ecosystem per month

columns.name: has_geothermal_heating
columns.description: Indicates whether the bio-dome incorporates geothermal heating, which could reduce reliance on solar panels by providing alternative energy.

columns.name: natural_disaster_frequency
columns.description: Average number of natural disasters occurring per year in the area of the ecosystem

columns.name: percentage_native_vegetation
columns.description: Percentage of the area within the ecosystem covered by native plants and trees.

columns.name: installation_region
columns.description: Geographic region where the bio-dome is installed, impacting environmental adaptation needs.

columns.name: natural_sunlight_hours
columns.description: Average daily sunlight hours the ecosystem receives

columns.name: air_quality_index
columns.description: Measure of the air quality within the ecosystem, scaled from good to hazardous

columns.name: investment_in_training
columns.description: Financial investment in employee training programs related to ecology and visitor services annually

columns.name: plant_coverage_percentile
columns.description: The percentile ranking of the area covered by plants within the bio-dome

columns.name: artificial_light_intensity
columns.description: Measured level of light provided by artificial sources within the ecosystem, in lumens.

columns.name: UV_coating_presence
columns.description: Indicates whether the surface material has a UV protective coating.

columns.name: insulation_type
columns.description: Type of insulation installed inside the bio-dome, affecting internal temperature regulation.

columns.name: daylight_hours
columns.description: Total daylight hours available per day

columns.name: average_temperature
columns.description: Average daily temperature inside the artificial ecosystem, measured in degrees Celsius

columns.name: investment_in_infrastructure
columns.description: Financial investment in the ecosystem's infrastructure and facilities on an annual basis

columns.name: number_of_high_energy_devices
columns.description: Total number of devices within the ecosystem that consume high amounts of energy, such as heating systems or artificial sunlight generators.

columns.name: light_intensity_level
columns.description: Measured level of ambient light inside the bio-dome, which influences plant growth and solar panel efficiency.

columns.name: water_body_count
columns.description: The number of significant water bodies within the ecosystem

columns.name: ecosystem_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each artificial ecosystem

columns.name: public_accessibility
columns.description: Indicates if the ecosystem is open for public visits

columns.name: plant_species_diversity
columns.description: Number of different plant species within the bio-dome, affecting ecological balance and microclimate conditions.

columns.name: artificial_light_usage_hours
columns.description: Total hours artificial lighting is used per day

columns.name: curated_floor_area_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of the bio-dome floor area specifically designed for aquatic and plant habitats

columns.name: adaptive_climate_control_status
columns.description: Whether the adaptive climate control system is active

columns.name: system_check_frequency_per_year
columns.description: The number of times the system's functionality is checked per year

columns.name: thermal_regulation_level
columns.description: Indicates the sophistication level of the thermal regulating technology used in the ecosystem.

columns.name: number_of_unique_species
columns.description: Total number of unique species present within the ecosystem

columns.name: educational_programs
columns.description: Indicates if the ecosystem offers educational programs to visitors

columns.name: relative_humidity_percentage
columns.description: Average relative humidity percentage in the ecosystem

columns.name: has_bioluminescent_flora
columns.description: Indicates if the ecosystem has bioluminescent plants

columns.name: energy_consumption_kWh
columns.description: Energy consumption in kilowatt-hours

columns.name: mechanical_reliability_score
columns.description: A numeric score indicating the current reliability of the environmental control system's machinery

columns.name: plant_cover_area
columns.description: Total area covered by plant life within the ecosystem in square meters

columns.name: hardscape_area
columns.description: Total area covered by non-living, man-made materials like concrete within the ecosystem in square meters

columns.name: is_enclosed
columns.description: Whether the ecosystem is mostly enclosed from the external environment

columns.name: temperature_control_efficiency
columns.description: Efficiency rating of the bio-dome's temperature control system, impacting energy usage and internal climate regulation.

columns.name: bio_dome_size_sq_m
columns.description: Size of the bio-dome in square meters

columns.name: energy_consumption_air_purification
columns.description: Total energy consumption per year for air purification systems in kilowatt-hours.

columns.name: UV_filter_installed
columns.description: Indicates whether UV-filter technology is installed in the dome.

columns.name: staff_per_hectare
columns.description: Number of staff members per hectare responsible for maintenance and operations

columns.name: backup_energy_reserves
columns.description: Total energy stored in backup systems in kilowatt-hours.

queries.question: What is the impact of adaptive climate control status on energy consumption in artificial ecosystems when considering external temperature variations in different seasons?
queries.true_hypothesis: In artificial ecosystems, the introduction of advanced climate control systems that adapt to both external weather conditions and internal ecosystem parameters (e.g., humidity, temperature) can optimize energy consumption. These systems reduce energy usage by applying a specific coefficient to energy consumption based on the adaptive climate control status and external temperature, adjusting consumption differently for different seasons to maintain optimal conditions.
